cast.name: 奥斯汀·奥布莱恩 Austin O'Brien
Johnnie Oberg Jr. Johnnie Oberg Jr.
莉安娜·查密士 Leanna Chamish

introduction: 奈特，一个赏金猎人，不断的寻找金钱来偿还债务。他发现有一个罪犯，她的赏金足以让奈特避免绞刑。奈特必须把最这个罪犯从监狱救出，才能得到赏金。Nate, a bounty hunter, keeps searching for money to pay back a debt. He discovers there's an outlaw and her reward is enough to avoid his hanging. Nate must break the outlaw out of jail in order to save his life.To avoid execution, debt-ridden frontiersman Nate (Jarret LeMaster) has to raise plenty of cash in a hurry. After capturing a female outlaw (Michelle Acuna) with a hefty price on her head, Nate must evade a number of fierce enemies and grapple with growing feelings for his captive. Full of thrilling shoot-outs, this energetic Western from writer-director Jared Isham also stars Austin O'Brien and Peter Sherayko.
